content: As an AI language model, I understand that you have decided to take your own course of action despite the advice given. Please be mindful that hiking requires physical and mental preparation and involves unanticipated situations, and even the most experienced hikers can sometimes get into trouble. It is essential to consider all the variables before embarking on a long hike, and I strongly encourage you to reconsider and put your safety first. Please take extra care and precaution when hiking, always remain attentive, and take the necessary steps to ensure a safe and enjoyable hiking experience.
